item.title: Shops help 317 delta
item.dc:creator: @xxpkpurexx xxpkpurexx
item.description:
@xxpkpurexx wrote:

[code] if (server.shopHandler.ShopSModifier[MyShopID] > 1) {
for (int j = 0; j <= server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]; j++) {
if (removeID == (server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][j] - 1)) {
IsIn = true;
break;
}
}
} else {
IsIn = true;
}
if (IsIn == false) {
sM(“You cannot sell " + getItemName(removeID)
+ " in this store.”);
} else {
int ShopValue = (int) Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(
removeID, 1, removeSlot));
String ShopAdd = “”;

					if ((ShopValue >= 1000) && (ShopValue < 1000000)) {
						ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000) + "K)";
					} else if (ShopValue >= 1000000) {
						ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000000)
								+ " million)";
					}
					sM(getItemName(removeID)
							+ ": shop will buy for " + ShopValue + " coins"
							+ ShopAdd);
				}
			}[/code]

Thats my shops code i want to make it where the shops buy back the same amount of a item back

i have castle wars tickets as a money holder for 100m and you can buy it for 100m but once u resell it its only 40m how can i make it where it buys it back for 100m?? please some1 help

Read full topic
